title: Hardwood-style Flooring, Modern Styles, Online Maintenance Requests
posting_body: ['Creekside Vista', '3100 Lumby Drive, Decatur, GA, 30034', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 61', 'OR Text', '61', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'WELCOME HOME', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 766 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Creekside Vista values your safety!', 'The community has implemented social distancing practices due to COVID-19.', 'Meet us virtually or by appointment for a socially distanced outside meeting!', 'Masks are required!', 'Features', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package', '- Hardwood-style Flooring', '- Private Balconies', '- Modern Styles', 'Community Amenities', '- Sundeck', '- Resort-Style Swimming Pool', '- Fitness Studio', '- Newly Renovated Homes', '- Clothes Care Center', '- Convenient Online Payments', '- Play Park', '- New Online Services', '- New Pool Lounge Area (Coming Soon)', '- Leash-Free Dog Park', '- Cyber Cafe', '- Online Maintenance Requests', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Pet Fee: $300', 'Pet Monthly Rent Min/Max: $20 - $40', 'Other Pets Allowed: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month, per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.', 'Qh70MUgXx2']
